turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I was hoping I could order a Venti cafe latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, this is from Starbucks, sorry about that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you think I could have some whipped on top of that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I believe you can! and you're looking for a venti cafe latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is this going to be hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be a hot one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of milk would you lik?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk, got it! thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i get this all ordered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One venti hot cafe latte with whole milk and whip cream. Correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and is this to be picked up at the california street starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, 15 Wolf Road, Albany, New York.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All righty. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to you mobile device.
